ai-patthana8.50:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, illustrious and confusion,
ai-patthana8.50:1.1_0: Not thought, due to corruption, does not give rise to defilements.
ai-patthana8.50:1.1_1: Not thoughts, dependent on thought, conditions give rise to the defilements.
ai-patthana8.50:1.1_2: thoughts that are not dependent on thought and the defilements don’t give rise to defilements.
ai-patthana8.50:2.1_0: Not thoughts, dependent on thought, and conditions give rise to the defilements.
ai-patthana8.50:3.1_0: Not corruption, nor is Dhamma for the corruption of defilements. Someone with defilement and corruption gives rise to the defilements.
ai-patthana8.50:3.1_1: This is the section in brief.
